source.network_wifiNetworksNone_description: Move closer to a Wi-Fi router to get better reception.
source.network_invalidAuth_description: Check the details you need to enter to connect to this network (such as passwords), and try connecting again.
source.network_invalidAuth_description_fromSave: It seems that the details needed to connect (such as passwords) have changed since you last connected. Try connecting again.
source.network_connectionError_description: Check the network configuration and hardware to see if it is working properly, and try connecting again.
source.network_proxyConfig_summary: Enable and configure proxies to send network traffic through
source.network_proxyConfig_description: Configure which proxies to send network request data through. You can also choose sites to exclude from proxying, for which a direct connection will be used instead.
source.network_proxyConfig_direct: Use a direct connection (don't use proxy servers)
source.network_proxyConfig_autoDetect: Automatically detect proxy settings to use for this network
source.network_proxyConfig_pacScriptUrl: Get proxy settings to use from a PAC script
source.network_proxyConfig_excludeMatches_descr: Enter the URLs of sites that should not be proxied, with one URL per line.
source.network_proxyConfig_saveNotice: The proxy settings you choose will not be applied until you save them.
source.users_summary: Manage user profiles and connected accounts
source.l10n_summary: Change language, region and keyboard settings
source.l10n_changeMessage: The new language that you choose will be applied on apps once they have been relaunched.
source.l10n_input_layout_description: You can add multiple keyboard layouts to easily switch between different languages and input modes when writing text.
source.personalisation_summary: Change the current background and theme
source.a11y_summary: Customise visual, auditory and navigatory access
source.a11y_readout_summary: Speak or read on-screen text and graphical descriptions
source.a11y_readout_description: Readout Navigation lets you read text and graphical descriptions shown on-screen through spoken feedback or through a refreshable braille display.
source.a11y_readout_disableDialog_description: No text will be readable through spoken feedback or a refreshable braille display until Readout Navigation is enabled again.
source.a11y_switch_summary: Full control and navigation with at least one switch
source.a11y_switch_description: Switch Navigation lets you access and navigate your device by using one or more switches â€” such as push buttons, foot pedals, sip-and-puff switches and more.
source.a11y_switch_disableDialog_description: You will not be able to navigate using a switch until Switch Navigation is enabled again.
source.interaction_summary: Choose how you wish to interact with LiveG
source.interaction_checkForUpdates: Automatically check for system updates in the background
source.interaction_checkForUpdates_description: Your device won't update automatically without your consent, but it is recommended to enable this option so that you can be notified when a new version or security update of LiveG OS comes out.
source.interaction_researchTelemetry_descriptio: When enabled, information about how you use your device (such as what apps you have installed and what system settings you have enabled) will be sent to LiveG so that improvements to LiveG OS can be made based on your own usage.

Cumulative statistical results produced from the data collected as part of a large sample of devices may be shared publicly in the interest of openness. Research objectives may change between system updates, and you can choose whether you wish to be notified of such changes.
source.interaction_researchTelemetry_notifyChan: Be notified when research objectives change
source.interaction_privacyInfo_description: The information that LiveG collects from your device is used to help LiveG to determine what improvements to LiveG OS should be made or prioritised. When you have these interaction options enabled, any data sent from your device will not contain anything that would reveal your personal information. You can opt in or out of these options at any time.
source.interaction_privacyInfo_link: Find out more about your privacy when using LiveG OS
source.updates_summary: Install updates that bring improvements to your device
source.updates_restartAfterComplete: Restart device after update has been completed
source.updates_powerWarning: This might take a while. Please do not power off this device.
source.updates_cannotCancel: You cannot cancel the update at this stage.
source.updates_upToDate_title: Your device is up to date
source.updates_upToDate_description: The latest update for your device is already installed.
source.updates_checkingFailed_description: Check your connection to the internet and try again.
source.updates_offline_description: To check for updates, connect to the internet.
source.updates_failed_description_recoverable: An error occurred which caused the update to be aborted, and no changes to the system were made. Check your connection to the internet and try again.
source.updates_failed_description_unstable: An error occurred which caused the update to be aborted while changes to the system were being made. If you experience any system instability, then you may want to reinstall LiveG OS to this device.
source.updates_readyToRestart_description: This update has now been installed. When you're ready, restart your device to apply the update.
source.updates_readyToRestart_autoRestartWarnin: This device has been set to automatically restart in 10 seconds.
source.advanced_summary: Additional settings for power users and developers
source.advanced_updates_updateCircuit_descripti: Get access to pre-release features by switching to a different update circuit. This may reduce system stability.
